TopicTitle: Twitch Thursday: Rich to the Rescue!

Articles.Content: <figure data-orig-width="480" data-orig-height="92" class="tmblr-full"><img data-orig-width="480" data-orig-height="92" src="https://41.media.tumblr.com/e6b9796e0425d604ccf4dd4df2733721/tumblr_inline_nqiogyPWPG1rr2wit_540.jpg"/></figure><p>RichardAdenot streams Kerbal Space Program weekly on Saturdays at 20h30 onwards. (GMT+2) . What he does? He rescues your stranded Kerbals, because someone has to! <br/></p><figure data-orig-width="674" data-orig-height="800" class="tmblr-full"><img data-orig-width="674" data-orig-height="800" src="https://41.media.tumblr.com/15e2ffb86c7701a606617661995e5a58/tumblr_inline_nqiq1uqQat1rr2wit_540.png"/></figure>
